title: Opposing fans are nothing compared to Calipari's daughters
text:
Opposing fans are nothing compared to Calipari's daughters John Calipari's daughters have prepared him for would-be hecklers. Slot to Kentucky Links 
Louisville coach Rick Pitino made waves Wednesday night at North Carolina, where at halftime, he had to be physically restrained from going after a Tar Heels fan. 
At halftime of Kentucky's game at Missouri Tuesday night, head coach John Calipari was forced to do a halftime interview with chants of "Cal, you suck" reverberating in the background. 
If Calipari appeared unfazed, it's only because opposing fans are nothing compared to his daughters, apparently. 
Calipari's daughter, Megan, tweeted that she and her sister, Erin, have aptly prepared their dad over the years. 
@TheErinCalipari the only reason dad doesn't react this way is because we've spent our entire lives heckling him â€” Megan Calipari (@MeganteCalipari) February 23, 2017 
Calipari said after the win at Missouri that if he ever stops being heckled when he's on the road, it's time to hang it up. 
"If I walk in the other building, and they're not cussing me, booing me, I will retire," Calipari said. 
At least he'll still have his daughters. Author
